subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Archery
lead_paragraph: Competitors at Lord’s will shoot against the backdrop provided by the late-Victorian Pavilion at the Marylebone Cricket Club in London, perhaps the most famous building on any cricket ground.
snippet: Competitors at Lord’s will shoot against the backdrop provided by the late-Victorian Pavilion at the Marylebone Cricket Club in London, perhaps the most famous building on any cricket ground.
